name: fclstop
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop))

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cv(hs0)))))
stmt.pretty: simp1bi(c0 ∈(c1[fClus]c2), c1 ∈ Top, c2 ∈(Fil ` ⋃ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈((cls ` c1)` hs0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfcls, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, cuni(c1))), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cv(hs0))))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[fClus]c2)→ c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈(c1[fClus]c2)↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` ⋃ c1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈((cls ` c1)` hs0))))
